ygData.subject: Re: [archive-crawler] Why am I only crawling DNS?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... These are boxes w/ 75k seeds? On the happy box, did it first do all 75k dns lookups before it advanced to robots and then pages? You might want to try

gsellek wrote:

>
> I'm stumped...  I setup two boxes w/ identical settings in 1.3.0
> other than the seed list.  Same modules and settings.  One box is
> crawling away happily at 50 pages/sec.  The other one is just doing
> DNS queries.  It's up to 45,000 of them now with still no web pages
> crawled.  No errors, just nothing but DNS. 

These are boxes w/ 75k seeds?

On the 'happy' box, did it first do all 75k dns lookups before it 
advanced to robots and then pages?

You might want to try the 'hold-queues' option.  Setting it to true will 
have Heritrix start in immediately on first seeds encountered favoring 
these before moving on to new seeds.

St.Ack


>
> Any ideas?
>
> Thanks,
> Greg
>
